TermDefinition.DefinitionText: Surgery to remove the urethra, lower part of the ureters, uterus, cervix, vagina, and bladder.

MediaLink.alt: Pronunciation of dictionary term "anterior pelvic exenteration"
Pronunciation of dictionary term "exenteración pélvica anterior"

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Cirugía para extraer la uretra, la parte inferior de los uréteres, el útero, el cuello uterino, la vagina y la vejiga.
